-1.title: No internet
-1.body: No internet connection available, please try again after connecting to the internet.

401.title: Welcome back!
401.body: Please select a child to continue.

419.title: Login Required
419.body: Your session has timed out. Please login again.

403.title: You Can't Do That
403.body: Please ask a grown-up to help you.

409.title: Already Registered
409.body: The email address has already been registered. Please register with a new email address or log in using this email address.

422.title: Date of Birth Error
422.body: The date of birth is in the future. Please correct the date of birth.

1001.title: That Didn't Work
1001.body: There was a problem with your email or password. Please try logging in again.

1002.title: Something Went Wrong
1002.body: There was a problem logging you in. Please try again.

1003.title: Email Verification Required
1003.body: Please follow the instructions in the email that we sent you and then log back in.

1004.title: Wrong PIN
1004.body:
If you can't remember your PIN,
please visit:

http://support.azoomee.com

1005.title: Name Already Exists
1005.body: You already have a child with this name. Please enter a unique name.

1007.title: Content Is Locked
1007.body: You need to subscribe to view this content.

2001.title: The time on your device is wrong
2001.body: Please correct the time on your device and try logging in again.

3001.title: Thank you!
3001.body: You can enjoy all content after logging in again.

3002.title: Something Went Wrong
3002.body: Your purchase could not be completed. Please try again later. If the problem persists, please contact our customer service.

3003.title: Oops!
3003.body:
It looks like you’ve already paid for an Azoomee Premium subscription.

Please try signing in with your existing Azoomee account or contact our customer service team if you need some help.

3004.title: Subscription Update Failed
3004.body:
The Apple subscription could not be verified. Please log in, with the Apple account that created the Azoomee subscription.

Contact our customer service team if you need some help.

3005.title: No Purchase To Restore
3005.body:
We could not find a previous purchase to restore.

Contact our customer service team if you need some help.

3006.title: No Renewal Found
3006.body:
Apple subscription renewal not found. Account has been changed to Free.

Contact our customer service team if you need some help.

3007.title: Subscription Error
3007.body:
Log in your Azoomee account on your Apple device to renew your subscription.

Contact our customer service team if you need some help.

4001.title: Game incompatible
4001.body: This game requires a newer Azoomee version. Please update Azoomee app from the app store and try again.

4002.title: Delete?
4002.body: Are you sure you want to delete profile?

4003.title: Unable To Delete
4003.body: Sorry we are unable to delete this profile at present. Please try again later.

5001.title: Report This Chat?
5001.body: Do you really want to report this chat?

5002.title: Reset This Chat?
5002.body: Do you really want to reset this chat?

6001.title: Sign Up or Log In
6001.body: Sign up or log in for access to the best kids’ TV shows, games and audiobooks in one safe app.

default.title: Something Went Wrong
default.body: No worries, a bunch of well trained Oomees are already working on this issue. Please log back in to start again.
